item.title: Poepies
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
What does this heading look like?

Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.

Addiitonal

item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Personal Details:

  • Name: Andries Bester   
  • Title: Product Manager
  • LinkedIn Profile
  • Portfolio
  • Mobile: +27712914643
  • E-mail: bester.dries@gmail.com
  • Location: Cape Town, South Africa

Professional Summary:

I am a seasoned web professional whose journey began as a freelance designer and web developer, passionately crafting websites and utilising new web technologies in order to serve stakeholder needs. 

Transitioning into a full-time role at one of the biggest online education providers in South Africa (GetSmarter), I initially focused on paid marketing infrastructure and organic development. My career path naturally evolved into product management, aligning with my core interests. In this role, I have garnered extensive experience in managing high-traffic platforms and leading an agile team of UX/UI and Engineering. Known for my strong interpersonal and leadership capabilities, I excel at fostering innovation and driving growth via refined web strategies and experimentation. I am a well rounded product specialist with experience across the entire software development lifecycle.

Education and Qualifications:

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: 3rd Floor, Landmark Building, 13 Umgazi Rd, Menlo Park, Pretoria, 0081
